statements: SELECT scholarship_name, amount FROM scholarships;
SELECT * FROM scholarships WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT scholarship_name, country, deadline FROM scholarships ORDER BY deadline DESC;
SELECT scholarship_name, amount FROM scholarships WHERE deadline > '2022-06-30';
SELECT scholarship_name, country, amount FROM scholarships ORDER BY amount ASC;
SELECT scholarship_name, country FROM scholarships ORDER BY scholarship_name DESC, amount ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT scholarship_name, amount, deadline FROM scholarships WHERE country = 'USA' AND amount > 5000 ORDER BY deadline ASC, amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM scholarships WHERE country = 'Canada' AND deadline > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY deadline DESC;
SELECT scholarship_name, amount FROM scholarships WHERE deadline < '2022-12-31' AND country IN ('USA', 'Canada') ORDER BY amount DESC, deadline ASC;
SELECT scholarship_name, country, amount, deadline FROM scholarships WHERE amount BETWEEN 2000 AND 10000 ORDER BY amount DESC, deadline ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM scholarships;
SELECT scholarship_name, amount FROM scholarships WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT scholarship_name, amount, country FROM scholarships ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT scholarship_name, application_deadline FROM scholarships WHERE amount > 5000;
SELECT * FROM applicants WHERE application_status = 'pending';
SELECT scholarship_name, amount, country FROM scholarships WHERE amount > 5000 ORDER BY scholarship_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM scholarships WHERE application_deadline > '2022-10-15' AND (country = 'USA' OR country = 'Canada') ORDER BY application_deadline ASC;

SELECT first_name, last_name, email, scholarship_name FROM applicants JOIN scholarships ON applicants.scholarship_id = scholarships.scholarship_id WHERE application_status = 'Accepted' ORDER BY first_name ASC;

SELECT scholarship_name, amount, application_deadline FROM scholarships WHERE country <> 'USA' AND scholarship_id IN (SELECT scholarship_id FROM applicants WHERE application_status = 'Pending') ORDER BY application_deadline ASC;
SELECT applicant_id, first_name, last_name, email FROM applicants WHERE scholarship_id IS NULL ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM scholarships ORDER BY scholarship_id DESC;
SELECT scholarship_name, amount FROM scholarships WHERE country='USA';
SELECT scholarship_name, country FROM scholarships WHERE amount > 5000 ORDER BY amount ASC;
SELECT university_name, location FROM universities WHERE country='UK';
SELECT student_name, status FROM applications WHERE scholarship_id=2;
SELECT scholarship_name, amount FROM scholarships WHERE amount > 5000
SELECT university_name, location FROM universities WHERE country = 'USA'
SELECT scholarship_name, country, amount FROM scholarships ORDER BY amount DESC
SELECT university_name, country, location FROM universities WHERE location LIKE '%City%'
SELECT student_name, scholarship_name, university_name, status FROM applications WHERE status = 'Approved'
SELECT * FROM Scholarships;
SELECT scholarship_name, amount FROM Scholarships ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT scholarship_name, country FROM Scholarships WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT scholarship_name, application_deadline FROM Scholarships WHERE application_deadline > '2022-05-01';
SELECT scholarship_name, requirements FROM Scholarships WHERE requirements IS NOT NULL;
SELECT scholarship_name, country, amount FROM Scholarships WHERE amount > 5000 ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT university_name, country, website FROM Universities WHERE total_scholarships >= 100 ORDER BY university_name;
SELECT student_name, country, date_of_birth FROM Students WHERE date_of_birth > '1990-01-01' ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT scholarship_name, country, application_deadline FROM Scholarships WHERE country = 'USA' ORDER BY application_deadline ASC;
SELECT student_name, country, email FROM Students WHERE country = 'Canada' ORDER BY student_name;
SELECT * FROM scholarships;
SELECT student_name, country_of_study, scholarship_amount FROM scholarships WHERE scholarship_amount > 5000;
SELECT university_name, country_name FROM universities JOIN countries ON universities.country_id = countries.country_id;
SELECT student_name, nationality, email FROM students WHERE nationality = 'USA';
SELECT student_name, university_name, application_date FROM students JOIN applications ON students.student_id = applications.student_id;
SELECT student_name, country_of_study FROM scholarships WHERE scholarship_amount > 5000
SELECT * FROM universities JOIN countries ON universities.country_id = countries.country_id
SELECT student_name, scholarship_amount, application_deadline FROM scholarships ORDER BY application_deadline DESC

SELECT student_name, university_name, country_name FROM students JOIN universities ON students.university_id = universities.university_id JOIN countries ON universities.country_id = countries.country_id
SELECT AVG(scholarship_amount) as avg_amount, COUNT(*) as total_scholarships FROM scholarships
